entries.title: Microsoft has not stopped forcing Edge on Windows 11 users
entries.summary: Microsoft announces vague changes to the default web browser setting for Windows Insider. Nothing but wishful thinking. Still force-opens web links in Edge.

entries.title: The trouble with decommissioning a used <abbr title='Fast IDentity Online'>FIDO</abbr> security key
entries.summary: You can’t throw out your worn-out USB security keys when you can’t recall what locks they’re for. Physical security tokens come with their own problems.
